subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Hapoel Ironi Kiryat Shmona, formed as a response to the rocket bombardment of the city by Hezbollah from Lebanon, secured its first Israeli league title after battling out a 0-0 draw.
snippet: Hapoel Ironi Kiryat Shmona, formed as a response to the rocket bombardment of the city by Hezbollah from Lebanon, secured its first Israeli league title after battling out a 0-0 draw.
